name: Paint Runner (Extra Credits game jam n° 5)
name_original: Paint Runner (Extra Credits game jam n° 5)
description:
Make your way on this infinite starship racetrack without hitting any obstacles.  Colored screens will appear periodically on the stage as the track runs faster under your ship. Use your palette to combine colours to destroy the screens matching with your ship.

- A / D or arrow kays: Change path.
- Hold left click to drag and drop the colours on your palette onto the converter in the middle of your ship.

Click on the red cross on your palette to reset the colour of your ship in case you made a mistake.

Good luck, and have fun !

---

This game was made in 5 days for the Extra Credits game jam n°5 with Unity3D. The theme this time around was "Passage". I tried to stay faithful to the theme by having the player run  through challenges in a corridor, and creating a color-based simple mechanic which makes reference to the  passage / transition form one state to another.  At first, I didn't know which one of these two ideas I should have picked, but then I said: "Why bother ? Let's do both!"

This game was inspired by another runner whom I forgot the name.  Anyway, I hope you like what I came up with !
